${modID}:RelicID.NAME: Good Relic
${modID}:RelicID.FLAVOR: Flavor text displayed in detailed relic view.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. [E] is an energy icon.

${modID}:Invigoration.NAME: Invigoration
${modID}:Invigoration.FLAVOR: The essence of what drives you forward. Who rests atop the Spire this time?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain [E] and #b3 #y${modID}:Soul.

${modID}:BoneLordsBoon.NAME: Bone Lord's Boon
${modID}:BoneLordsBoon.FLAVOR: The Bone Lord has smiled upon you. He demands a Sacrifice.

${modID}:BearArms.NAME: Bear Arms
${modID}:BearArms.FLAVOR: You recall something about a right to these...?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength and #b1 #yDexterity.

${modID}:Mitigation.NAME: Mitigation
${modID}:Mitigation.FLAVOR: Being defensive can have its benefits.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play #b3 #ySkills in a single turn, gain #b2 #y${modID}:Bones and #b2 #y${modID}:Soul.

${modID}:RagingSpirit.NAME: Raging Spirit
${modID}:RagingSpirit.FLAVOR: The fire within shall burn brighter than the fire around you.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have #b8 or more #y${modID}:Soul, gain #b3 #yStrength.

${modID}:DNAMutator.NAME: DNA Mutator
${modID}:DNAMutator.FLAVOR: Your enemies are now less resistant. Exploit this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose #b2 #y${modID}:Resistance.

${modID}:FracturedDiamond.NAME: Fractured Diamond
${modID}:FracturedDiamond.FLAVOR: Imperfect but strong, just like you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain #b2 #y${modID}:Bones.

${modID}:CorrosiveAura.NAME: Corrosive Aura
${modID}:CorrosiveAura.FLAVOR: If your enemies fear you, have you become the real monster?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, remove #yArtifact from ALL enemies.

${modID}:Vivification.NAME: Vivification
${modID}:Vivification.FLAVOR: A renewed spirit takes hold once more. The new Spire's host won't know what hit them.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #gInvigoration. At the start of each combat, gain [E] [E] . At the start of your turn, gain #b2 #y${modID}:Soul.

${modID}:ShepherdsSoul.NAME: Shepherd's Soul
${modID}:ShepherdsSoul.FLAVOR: The soul of a kind shepherd. How did this end up in the Spire?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have #b6 or more #y${modID}:Soul, gain #b1 #y${modID}:Scapegoat.

${modID}:Magnitude9.NAME: Magnitude 9
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #y${modID}:Stun ALL enemies, but gain #b2 #yVulnerable.
